text: Energy efficiency in buildings is a major topic when we think about economics,
This course explains energy efficiency in buildings from A to Z.
In this course, we provide students both a history about the achievements of building
energy efficiency and insights into the latest developments from policy making,
research, academia, the private sector perspective through
sets of in-depth conversations with leading international experts.
The course content is one of the most
comprehensive ever assembled on building energy efficiency.
We hope that students come away excited about how building energy efficiency is
a terrific opportunity for innovation across the domains of technology,
policy and finance and sparks excitement
in students on how they might direct their own efforts going forward.
